summary: REQ-7/8/9/10 appear implemented in Landing/Header/Footer components per diff. REQ-11 is partially implemented (HTML references favicon), but presence of the favicon.ico file at the public path is not evidenced. Also, index.html title was changed to unrelated chunked-upload wording, which was not requested (cosmetic/branding refresh only).

missing_requirements.requirement: Three cards render below the subtitle and maintain equal widths/heights at the same breakpoint (uniform presentation).
missing_requirements.reason: The Landing cards are placed in a responsive grid (md:grid-cols-3) but there is no explicit styling to enforce equal heights (e.g., h-full/flex) across cards; content-length differences could produce uneven heights.

missing_requirements.requirement: The built app includes a favicon.ico at the expected public path.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the HTML entry point referencing /favicon.ico, but no favicon.ico file is shown as added/modified in the diff summary, so its presence at the public path cannot be verified from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed the HTML page title to an unrelated chunked-upload marketing sentence.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to wire up favicon.ico in the HTML entry point; it did not request changing the document title, and the new title content references chunked uploads which is outside the stated cosmetic/branding refresh scope.
